name: That same old room
description:
This was made for the LD37 jam.

A kid sees herself alone in her parents apartment, as her imagination creates monsters for her to defeat.
We created the whole art, music and some of the sound effects.

There were so many other features we started but had not time to finish or fix its so many bugs in the time of the jam that we ended up with this much simpler version of what was our intention. We learned a lot with it though.

Michelle Faifer @micfaifer
Emmanuel Santana @flyingvelvetlob
